item.title: CVE-2020-4686|2024-09-16T16:58:32.365Z -- ibm -- san%20volume%20controller%20and%20storwize%20family
item.description: IBM Spectrum Virtualize 8.3.1 could allow a remote user authenticated via LDAP to escalate their privileges and perform actions they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 186678.
